short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple chrome tool which lets you save your current window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome tool to bookmark your current window which in later can be loaded in just one click in same window or in new window. Very easy to manage and very simple to use. Very useful when people browse interrelated sites like in case they are working on something and use different sites to achieve one goal e.g web develpment(aws, github, stackoverflow, etc). from now on user can easily focus on their purpose of browsing, leave the website name headache to window bookmark
